item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Kumo

Kumo, a Japanese steak, sushi and hibachi restaurant, just opened up on the corner of State and Elm street, where Fire used to be. Generous praise and thanks to esteemed NHC'er Larry, who is our contact at Kumo, and who has negotiated the following drink specials with the owner:

All beers: $4
All cocktails: $5
All glasses of wine: $5
Sake: $4

They will also be putting out California rolls, Edamame, and Chicken Yaki Tori (Japanese chicken skewers).

Parking can be found in the municipal lot diagonally across Elm Street from Kumo.

Your contact for the event: Ben (203-554-5144)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: 5/5 Happy Hour - Kumo Japanese Restaurant
